traits.name: LiDARSmith_CoreBackbone
traits.description: Central framework managing UI, processing pipeline, terrain filters, and integration logic for LiDAR/Smith. Supports phase-based sprint development and modular feature toggling.

traits.name: LiDARSmith_MemorySyncTrait
traits.description: Ensures safe synchronization of memory instructions, traits, and state tracking across all LiDARSmith sprints. Handles auto-export and rollback compatibility with backups.

traits.name: LiDARSmith_BackupValidatorTrait
traits.description: Runs consistency checks on backups, confirming that payloads, GUI states, traits, and instructions are intact and restorable before backup finalization.

traits.name: LiDARSmith_UltraDetectTrait
traits.description: Powers advanced AI/ML-based artifact detection, enabling terrain blemish identification, spike removal, and data anomaly cleaning with adjustable strength levels.

traits.name: LiDARSmith_UIClarityTrait
traits.description: Maintains high-standard GUI clarity, layout intuitiveness, and icon behavior. Governs sidebar tool logic, context-sensitive option displays, and live-preview toggles.

traits.name: AeonForge_MasterProjectTrait
traits.description: Defines the parent meta-project that oversees LiDARSmith, TerrApolate, and Synthetic Terrain systems. Used for macro-level control, knowledge transfer, and structural inheritance.

traits.name: AeonForge_StratumRuntimeTrait
traits.description: Governs the simulation engine core of Aeon/Forge. Enables tectonic plate logic, terrain dynamics, geological field evolution, and heat/stress map runtime behaviors.

traits.name: TerrApolate_TerrainExtrapolatorTrait
traits.description: Drives the extrapolation of heightmaps or terrain data from incomplete inputs. Merges geological inference, erosion physics, and satellite pattern logic into near-LiDAR quality estimation.

traits.name: TerrApolate_DataSynthesisTrait
traits.description: Handles synthesis of terrain data using multiple sources such as satellite, DEMs, and inferred geological models. Enables filling in terrain gaps where LiDAR is missing or corrupted.

traits.name: SyntheticEarth_TerrainInferenceTrait
traits.description: Advanced terrain generation trait that learns from high-fidelity sources to simulate realistic terrain features in non-LiDAR regions, driving future planet-scale modeling.
